title: Darkstream: fake news meltdown
author: VD
content_html:
Tonight’s Darkstream will be at 7 PM EST and will cover fake news and Fukushima as well as SJWs doubling down at Highlights and NaNoWriMo.

UPDATE: The replay is here.
